dc.title: Performance.gov | Performance.gov
dc.description: Performance.gov is an official U.S. Government website that provides a coherent and concise picture of the progress the Federal government is making in the areas of performance goals, technology, financial management, human resources, acquisitions, customer service, sustainability, and open government. The management of the website is coordinated by the Office of Management and Budget (OMB) with the assistance of the individual agencies that participate in these activities.
